interface thx.IAssertBehavior

import thx.Assert;

Available on all platforms

Implementors
DefaultAssertBehavior
DefaultAssertBehavior

Defines the defaiult behavior when thx.Assert static methods are invoked.

Defines a protocol to interact with the thx.Assert static methods.

To use a custom IAssertBehavior with Assert simply assing your instance to thx.Assert.behavior.
